title: my friend cant login
body:
so my mate was going to jump on lol and play a few games with me but he cant login it just says his password is wrong, even though he could a couple days ago. i know his pass and tried on mine but couldn't login and he has not  received any emails that his pass has been changed. when he tries to login to this main site it says it cant find a combination of that user name and pass, any ideas as to whats going on would be appreciated.
thanks

replies.body:
2 of my mates have also encountered this problem. Pretty infuriating. Even resetting the PW wont help. Support tickets been open for days.
Try to make another account...cant queue until you get to level 3 lol...
Try to get his password reset through the email the account was created on. I believe there is a button that says like 'Reset Password' or 'Forgot your password?' Try that.
